title: No-Bake Peanut Butter Cup Cake [Vegan, Gluten-Free]
directions: Combine ingredients for the crust into a food processor until it becomes a dough consistency.
Put into mold and put in freezer. (I used a small tart pan, but a small pie dish or ramekin would work fine).
Make chocolate mixture and pour over the top of the mold. Reserve a bit to drizzle over the top of the cake at the end.
Add the peanut butter mixture ingredients to a bowl and mix until well combined.
Spread the peanut mixture on top of the chocolate layer of the cake.
Top with halved homemade vegan PB cups (or your favorite brand) and drizzle with remaining chocolate. Freeze for 3-4 hours.
Remove from freezer 5-10 minutes before serving.
ingredients: 1/2 tbsp. agave nectar (or other liquid sweetener)
1/2 c. peanut butter or your favorite natural brand
1-2 tbsp. date paste or maple syrup
Use your favorite brand of vegan peanut butter cups to break up on top or use a homemade recipe.
